name: Dunk Line Challenge
description:
Daily Base EVENTS:

Dunk Line Challenge includes different Events in which higher scorer will be announced very NEXT day. You will receive Notification about Winner or you can see on LEADERBOARD too.

THURSDAY EVENT:

SATURDAY EVENT:

SWEET SUNDAY EVENT:


Come on now, join everybody on the playground of unlimited basketball action!

Come on! Test your reflexes and rhythm skills! See the surprises and wonders every level holds for you.

Challenging Brain Game:

A brain-training puzzle game that activates your mind as you play. When you've got a spare moment, on your daily commute, or before going to bed, why not experience what it feels like to activate you mind?

FEATURES:

• There are 200+ stages.

• At first, it starts off with simple shapes, but each time your level increases, the number of lines increases, score increases and it gets more and more complicated.

•You might think it's too easy early on.

•However, clearing the simple stages is also important.

•More complicated stages can all be found scattered through the simple stages.

•LEADERBOARD Includes on which you can see Higher scorer from WORLDWIDE.
